jd: From: SUSHMITA, KPG99 kumaris@kpgtech.com Reply to: kumaris@kpgtech.com Title: AWS Cloud DBAHybrid: Jersey City, NJ (Local to NJ/NY or within commutable distance i.e. 100mi. 3 days on site- Hybrid RoleDuration: 6 + months Educated in the US is a MUSTNeed Sr. candidate and at least 2.*** MUST Have Investment Banking and Market Data environment experience***Team is currently looking for an AWS Cloud DBA with experience doing DevOps.Cloud Database RDS2-3 years of experience with AWS Databases • Experience in migrating data from on-prem to RDS and 53 Exceptional knowledge of AWS Console, AWS CLI S3, DMS ◦ RDS: Postgres, MYSOL, Aurora Postgres and NoSQL (MongoDB) Cloud Watch • Good knowledge of ◦ AWS SDK e RedShift ◦ Snowflake O Redis ○ High Availability and disaster recovery ◦MSKIStreaming/Messaging Architectures AWS IAM and integration with AW'S Identity Center ○ Service Resiliency - HADR designs/solutions tied to business tiering - replication across AZs and Regions e ETL Tools/MWAA AirfiowlAWS Glue EKS/ECR • Knowledge of ◦ Non-relational AWS databases: DynamoDB, DocumentDB, Neptune, OpenSearch ◦ Load balancing • Nice to have Experience in migrating data from on-prem into Snowflake, RedShift.Automation/DevOps Experience• Exceptional knowledge of: ○ Python, Terraform, Cloud Formation Lambda Enterprise level Application Integration experience on AWS Experience with ◦ Automation and monitoring within AWS ○ Continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) • Ability to automate migration of data to RDS, $3, Snowflake, Redshift
